      • DFSOutputStream.DataStreamer

        private DFSOutputStream.DataStreamer(LocatedBlock lastBlock,
                            HdfsFileStatus stat,
                            int bytesPerChecksum)
                              throws IOException
        Construct a data streamer for appending to the last partial block
        Parameters:
        lastBlock - last block of the file to be appended
        stat - status of the file to be appended
        bytesPerChecksum - number of bytes per checksum
        Throws:
        IOException - if error occurs

        void tryMarkPrimaryDatanodeFailed()
        This method is used when no explicit error report was received, but something failed. When the primary node is a suspect or unsure about the cause, the primary node is marked as failed.

      • setupPipelineForAppendOrRecovery

        private boolean setupPipelineForAppendOrRecovery()
                                          throws IOException
        Open a DataOutputStream to a DataNode pipeline so that it can be written to. This happens when a file is appended or data streaming fails It keeps on trying until a pipeline is setup
        Throws:
        IOException

      • nextBlockOutputStream

        private LocatedBlock nextBlockOutputStream()
                                    throws IOException
        Open a DataOutputStream to a DataNode so that it can be written to. This happens when a file is created and each time a new block is allocated. Must get block ID and the IDs of the destinations from the namenode. Returns the list of target datanodes.
        Throws:
        IOException
